member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.ClientConnection.IClientConnectionInformation
member.summary: Interface providing all informtion that is shared by all possible states of a client connection.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.ClientConnection.IControllerInformation
member.summary: Provides information for a client connection in which the client is controlling the experiment.

member.name: P:GOLDi.Concepts.ClientConnection.IControllerInformation.BusProtectionUnitEndpoint
member.summary: Get the endpoint of the BPU participating in the experiment.

member.name: P:GOLDi.Concepts.ClientConnection.IControllerInformation.SystemProtectionUnitEndpoint
member.summary: Get the endpoint fo the SPU participating in the experiment.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.ClientConnection.IDeniedConnectionInformation
member.summary: Signals that the client does not have the permission to connect to the server.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.ClientConnection.IVisitorInformation
member.summary: Signals that the client is requesting a connection as an observer.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IExperimentCommunicationProvider
member.summary: Provides RPC calls to the GOLDi cloud for experiment management tasks.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IExperimentCommunicationProvider.DeactivateAllExperimentsAsync
member.summary: Signal the cloud to stop all experiments that are run on this server.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IExperimentCommunicationProvider.DeactivateExperimentAsync(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Removes an experiment fromt he list of currently active experiments.
member.param: The ID of the experiment created by the GOLDi cloud.
The current session token of the user.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IExperimentCommunicationProvider.GetClientConnectionInformationAsync(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Request information about the role of the connected client.
member.param: The ID of the experiment created by the GOLDi cloud.
The current session token of the user.
member.returns: An object implementing an interface derrived from describing the role of the client.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IExperimentCommunicationProvider.GetExampleAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a raw representation of the programming file for the example.
member.param: The ID of the experiment created by the GOLDi cloud.
Number of the example.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IExperimentCommunicationProvider.GetProgramFileAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the programming file for the given experiment which was uploaded by the user.
member.param: The ID of the experiment created by the GOLDi cloud.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareTestCommunicationProvider
member.summary: Provides RPC calls to the GOLDi cloud for automatic firmare testing.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareTestCommunicationProvider.BeginFirmwareTestAsync(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IUntestedFirmware)
member.summary: Signal the GOLDi cloud, that the test for the given firmware file has started.
member.param: An object which was aquired using the function.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareTestCommunicationProvider.EndFirmwareTestWithFailureAsync(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IUntestedFirmware)
member.summary: Signal the GOLDi cloud, that the test for the given firmware file failed.
member.param: An object which was aquired using the function.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareTestCommunicationProvider.EndFirmwareTestWithoutResultAsync(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IUntestedFirmware)
member.summary: Signal the GOLDi cloud, that the test for the given firmware cannot be performed.
member.param: An object which was aquired using the function.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareTestCommunicationProvider.EndFirmwareTestWithSuccessAsync(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IUntestedFirmware,GOLDi.Fabric.Messages.ServiceMessages.AliveMessage)
member.summary: Signal the GOLDi cloud, that the test for the given firmware file succeeded and that it is ready for deployment.
member.param: An object which was aquired using the function.
Reply to a ping packet created by the device.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareTestCommunicationProvider.GetNextUntestedFirmwareAsync
member.summary: Get a firmware file which was uploaded to the GOLDi cloud for automatic testing.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareTestCommunicationProvider.GetTestDeviceDefaultFirmwareAsync(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IDeviceHardwareInformation)
member.summary: Get a firmware file that will be applied to the test device when the test is completed.
member.param: Provides information about the test devices type.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareUpdateCommunicationProvider
member.summary: Provides RPC calls to the GOLDi cloud for automatic firmware updating.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareUpdateCommunicationProvider.GetLatestFirmwareAsync(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IDeviceInformation)
member.summary: Request the latest firmware for the device or null, if it is up-to-date.
member.param: Information about hard- and firmware versions of the device.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareUpdateCommunicationProvider.LogFailedFirmwareUpdateAsync(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IVerifiedFirmware,GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IDeviceInformation,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inform the GOLDi cloud that the firmware update of the given device failed.
member.param: A firmware that was gathered using
Information about the device that failed to be updated correctly.
Flag indicating wether the device can still be used, i.e. still has its old firmware.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IFirmwareUpdateCommunicationProvider.LogSuccessfulFirmwareUpdateAsync(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IVerifiedFirmware,GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IDeviceInformation)
member.summary: Inform the GOLDi cloud that the firmware update of the given device was successful.
member.param: A firmware that was gathered using
Information about the device that was sucessfully updated.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.ILocationProvider
member.summary: Defines an auxilliary interface providing the location ID of the current server.

member.name: P:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.ILocationProvider.Location
member.summary: Location ID of the currently running server or null, if there is no associated location.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IRawCloudAccess
member.summary: Provides access to methods provided by the GOLDi cloud.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IRawCloudAccess.CallAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes a function in the GOLDi cloud without a result or parameter.
member.param: Name of a function that is provided by the GOLDi cloud.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IRawCloudAccess.CallAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Invokes a function in the GOLDi cloud with a parameter, but without a result.
member.param: Name of a function that is provided by the GOLDi cloud.
An objects whichs public properties and fields act as a parameters to the function.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IRawCloudAccess.QueryAsync``1(System.String)
member.summary: Perform a query to the GOLDi cloud.
member.param: Name of a function that is provided by the GOLDi cloud.
member.returns:
An instance of an object of the requested type whichs public fields and properties are set to the values returned by the function.
This function might also return null if the function call itself return null.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.CloudCommunication.IRawCloudAccess.QueryAsync``1(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Perform a query to the GOLDi cloud with a parameter.
member.param: Name of a function that is provided by the GOLDi cloud.
An objects whichs public properties and fields act as a parameters to the function.
member.returns:
An instance of an object of the requested type whichs public fields and properties are set to the values returned by the function.
This function might also return null if the function call itself return null.

member.summary: Defines a handler that performs a regular maintenance task.

member.summary: Defines in which interval the maintenance should be performed.

member.summary: Perform the maintenance task for the given device. This method will be called directly after a call to .

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IDeviceMaintenanceHandler.PrepareMaintenanceAsync(GOLDi.Fabric.Infrastructure.ILink,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Prepares the execution of the maintenance task.
member.param: An link for exclusive access to the device.
Cancellation token to abort the maintance preparation.
member.returns: True, if a maintenance step is required ( will be invoked), False otherwise.

member.name: T:GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IDeviceMaintenanceHandlerFactory
member.summary: Provides a factory for objects. A device maintenace handler will be instantiated for each found device.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IDeviceMaintenanceHandlerFactory.Create(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IConnectedDevice)
member.summary: Creates a handler for the given device.
member.param: Information about the deivce the handler should target.
member.returns: An instance of the maintenace handler for the given device.
member.exception: If returned false for the given device, an might be thrown.

member.name: M:GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IDeviceMaintenanceHandlerFactory.IsSupported(GOLDi.Concepts.Devices.IConnectedDevice)
member.summary: Chekc whether the given device type is supported by the maintenance handler.
member.param: Information about the found device.
member.returns: True, if the handler is applicable, false otherwise.
